name: Fairway (NaoYu, Antoine Foucault)
description:
●○●○●○●○●

Description:

A golf game where you can play in different environments and use the wind and ice to guide you towards your destination. However you must watch out, for the road will not always be easy to follow.

●○●○●○●○●

How to play:

Hold the left mouse button to throw the ball in the direction the arrow points to. 

The side bar on your left will tell you the strength with which you are throwing it. The longer you hold the left mouse button the stronger the throw will be

The green button indicates you when you can throw the ball a second time. You can therefore launch the ball multiple times in mid air. 

●○●○●○●○●

The Team

This game was made in three weeks using Unity as part of a school project. 

Game ArtistGame ProgrammerGame designerJulien Dennemont
Nimlot Elise
Naomie Halter
Antoine FoucaultHenri Berteloot
